name: ${localWorkspaceFolderBasename}
onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y build-essential libicu-dev libmagic-dev cmake pkg-config libssl-dev && git config --global --add safe.directory ${containerWorkspaceFolder}
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'gem install bundler workato-connector-sdk && echo "alias wtest=\"make test CONNECTOR=\"" >> ~/.bashrc && echo "alias wconsole=\"make console CONNECTOR=\"" >> ~/.bashrc && echo "alias wcheck=\"workato exec check connectors/\"" >> ~/.bashrc && source ~/.bashrc'
